text:
Lord Hadran d'[[Cannith]] was the founder of the committee that would eventually become the [[Twelve]]—"an institute for the application of magic." At the conclusion of the [[War of the Mark]], Lord Hadran called for the [[dragonmarked house]]s to formally cement
their alliance by creating a [[citadel|Ziggurat of the Twelve]]—a center for research
and study of both [[arcane magic]] and the potential of the
[[dragonmark]]ed.
title: Hadran d'Cannith
